thread.title: Algeria: Labour, Employment and Social Security - Algeria, China Sign Cooperation Action Plan
thread.title_full: Algeria: Labour, Employment and Social Security - Algeria, China Sign Cooperation Action Plan

title: Algeria: Labour, Employment and Social Security - Algeria, China Sign Cooperation Action Plan
text:
Zimbabwe: 'Reduced to Paupers' 
In accordance with the clauses of the action plan, the two sides will exchange, during the Conference of the International Labour Organization (ILO), views on issues relating to employment, labour and social security system and the reforms undertaken by the two countries in the field. 
In a statement to the press following the signing ceremony, El Ghazi underlined that the action plan constitute a "reference" for the exchange between Algeria and China and will strengthen the "good" relations and cooperation in several areas. 
This cooperation will allow to highlight Algeria's experience in the promotion of employment and curbing unemployment, particularly through the creation of small business as part of the various employment support mechanisms, in addition to the reforms in the sector of social security, said the minister. 
For his part, the Chinese official welcomed the signing of the action plan, which, he said, will contribute to the implementation of the cooperation agreement signed between the governments of the two countries and will allow to grant facilities to the Chinese workers in Algeria and the Algerian workers in China.
